/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of vehicles including cars, buses, and bicycles. The buildings flanking the street are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a sense of dynamism to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
